title: [Skin idea] Star Guardian Leona
body:
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/010/641/587/large/thorsten-erdt-sg-leona-final-web.jpg?1525453074

**Star Guardian Leona**

The first idea was based on Rose Quartz from Steven Universe and developed from there.
I mean, Rose is like a Starguardian skin made for Leona. She has a shield, a sword, protects the planet and she has a pet lion!
Leona needs a pet lion, too! Coming to think about it, she doesn't have a single skin that even picks up the lion theme.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 
If you like it, please show some suppurt by giving it a thumbs up and/or comment below. 

Also check out my other skin ideas over at my artstation gallery. (including links back to the corresponding thread here)
https://www.artstation.com/thorstenerdt/albums/751268
